item.title: Posters
item.description: Presenter Title Alma Davidson Automatic modeling of tissue specificity of viruses Arup Panda How environment shapes the global codon and amino acid usage pattern of microbial communities: A cross-biome metagenomic analysis David Shallom Accelerating whole cell simulations of mRNA translation using a dedicated hardware Hadar Ben Shoshan Modeling evolution of local genetic instability Lee Azolai Exosomal DNA as a novel biomarker in brain cancers diagnostics Liyam Chitayat Levi Microbiome Engineering Mahua Bhattacharya Non-optimal codon usage determines the protein level dynamics during cell-cycle Marina Parr Genomic determinants of viral host diversity Michael Peeri Analysis of selection on mRNA secondary structure strength in protein-coding sequences within conserved protein families Nataly Makarenkov Circulating Micro-RNAs As Biomarkers of Visceral Obesity-Related Adipose Tissue Disease (OrAD) Nicolas Lynn Detecting and Understanding Meaningful Cancerous Mutations based on Computational Models of mRNA Splicing Shai Cohen Modelling the phenotypic outcomes of CRISPR-Cas genome editing technologies Shani Cohen Machine Learning for prediction of sRNA-mRNA interactions Sharon Bader Computational Modeling of the effect of miRNA binding sites distribution on mRNA stability Shimshi Atar Effect of human microbiome supplementation on metabolic disease and other conditions Shir Bahiri Elitzur Designing DNT sensing bacteria based on computational models Sophie Vinokour Determinants of Efficient Modulating of Ribosomal Traffic Jams Stav Carmel Ezra Modeling the effect of rRNA-mRNA interactions and mRNA folding on mRNA translation in organelles Stav Lutzky & Isana Veksler-Lublinsky Functional interplay between microRNAs, RNA binding proteins, and alternative polyadenylation in gene regulation in C.
